lead_paragraph: WEINSTOCK--Leon, 93, died April 29th, peacefully at home. Predeceased by his beloved wife Elaine. Survived by his loving family, daughter Laura Estersohn (Glenn), son Robert (Risa), grandchildren Matthew (Elizabeth), Amy, Emily, Grace, great-grandson Ethan, and dear friend Rita Rodin. Funeral Sunday, 1pm, Gutterman Funeral Home, Hackensack, NJ. 1/3
